narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
Applicant is ready to be licensed as a Class A dealer/breeder. License fee must be submitted to the Fort Collins
Office to receive the USDA license. Send one copy of inspection report and license fee to the following address.
USDA-APHIS- Animal Care
2150 Centre Avenue, Building B
Mail Stop # 3W11
Fort Collins, CO 80526-8117
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner.
